title: can't set `_retryHandler`
body:
<!--
Please use this issue tracker for bugs and feature requests only. In case you need support please use one of
Yii communities listed at https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/wiki/communities
-->

### What steps will reproduce the problem?

```php
Yii::$app->getDb()->commandMap['mysql'] = [
    'class' => 'yii\db\Command',
    'retryHandler' => function (\yii\db\Exception $e, $attempt) {
        if (Str::contains($e->getMessage(), 'MySQL server has gone away')) {
            Yii::$app->getDb()->close();
            Yii::$app->getDb()->open();

            return true;
        }

        return false;
    }
];
Yii::$app->getDb()->commandMap['mysqli'] = Yii::$app->getDb()->commandMap['mysql'];

// `dd` is from larapack/dd
dd(Yii::$app->getDb()->createCommand(), Yii::$app->getDb()->createCommand("SELECT * FROM `user` WHERE `id`=:qp0", [':qp0' => 1]));

```
